items.name: Fertilized Alamodactylus Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides regular nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Digested Clay
items.description: Alamodactylus consumes sand and mixes it with cactus sap to create clay to build its nests. Useful for survivors in the desert...

items.name: Hunt Point
items.description: Signifies a significant kill for your Albertosaurus. Use it to unlock skills and features. Cannot be transferred between Albertosauruses and cannnot be removed from their inventory.

items.name: Hunt Point (Admin)
items.description: Signifies a significant kill for your Albertosaurus. Use it to unlock skills and features. Cannot be transferred between Albertosauruses and cannnot be removed from their inventory.

items.name: Albertosaurus Saddle
items.description: Equip an Albertosaurus with this to ride it.

items.name: Albert Base Ability
items.description: THE ALBERT IS POGGING?!

items.name: Skin: Dense Muscles
items.description:
Passive ability. The muscles underneath Albertosaurus's skin experience profound growth. However, the skin above becomes thinner to allow these muscles to move.

-50% Resistance for +25% Movement Speed and +25% Melee Damage.

As a Skin ability, this cannot stack with Thick Skin or Thin Skin.

items.name: Ability: Crushing Bite
items.description:
Unlocks Albertosaurus's Crushing Bite ability, which slows targets for a time. The attack becomes available on C.

The default buff time is 10 seconds. The smaller or larger the target is compared to Albertosaurus (Albert's 250 drag weight divided by target's drag weight), the longer or shorter the buff will last.

items.name: Ability: I Recognize This
items.description: Unlocks a... change to Albertosaurus's roar. The ability can be shifted on and off with O.

items.name: Ability: Shoulderbash
items.description: Unlocks Albertosaurus's Shoulder Bash. Deals good damage for its size, while inflicting heavy knockback. The attack becomes available on X.

items.name: Ability: Swift Swim
items.description: Unlocks the ability for Albertosaurus to sprint swim in water.

items.name: Skin: Thick Skin
items.description:
Passive ability. The skin of the albertosaurus becomes thicker and more resistant to damage and stress. However, the excess weight makes things more difficult for the Albertosaurus to move.

+25% Resistance and +25% Weight at the cost of -50% speed

As a Skin ability, this cannot stack with Thin Skin or Dense Muscles.

items.name: Skin: Thin Skin
items.description:
Passive ability. The skin of the albertosaurus becomes thinner, thus less effort needed to move. However, the loss of mass decreases strength for carry weight and resistance.

-25% Resistance and -25% weight for +50% movement speed.

As a Skin ability, this cannot stack with Thick Skin or Dense Muscles.

items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides superior nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Challenger Mindset
items.description:
Inostrancevia deals 15% more damage to, and takes 15% less, from bosses, mission dinos, and alphas. Ino heals and gains increased XP after killing one. 

CANNOT BE USED WITH OTHER MINDSET ABILITIES.

items.name: Collector Mindset
items.description:
Makes items weigh 30% less in the inventory of Inostrancevia. Black Pearls, Gems, Silica Pearls, Element Shards, Element Dust, and Mutagel are given a 3.5x harvest multiplier.

CANNOT BE USED WITH OTHER MINDSET ABILITIES.

items.name: Estute Mindset
items.description:
Killing anything above 550 drag weight grants 1.5x xp for 5 minutes to self and allies. Killing an Alpha grants 2x XP for 30 minutes. Killing a boss grants 4x XP for an hour.

CANNOT BE USED WITH OTHER MINDSET ABILITIES.

items.name: Frenzied Mindset
items.description:
Makes Inostrancevia deal 25% more damage when above 75% HP. After dealing damage for a set amount of time, heal for a time.

CANNOT BE USED WITH OTHER MINDSET ABILITIES.

items.name: Ino Base Ability
items.description: THE INO IS POGGING?!

items.name: Survivor Mindset
items.description:
Upon killing any target, Inostrancevia takes 25% less damage and heals over time. 

CANNOT BE USED WITH OTHER MINDSET ABILITIES.

items.name: Traveler Mindset
items.description:
Makes Inostrancevia 25% faster overall, but reduces attack and defence by 15% each. 

CANNOT BE USED WITH OTHER MINDSET ABILITIES.

items.name: Digested Cementing Paste
items.description: Scorpiovenator's diet is aided by a complex and powerful digestive system. This Digestive system breaks down chitin and keratin into a paste-like slush that the animal then excretes. It's the exact same as cementing paste!

items.description: Drops a random assortment of gear, including content from Kami Creations!

items.name: Box o' Chocolates
items.description: <RichColor Color="1, 0.5, 0.8, 1">This chocolate's delicious, despite its origins. The Island's creatures LOVE it, as it fully heals them or advances their taming!</>

items.name: Valentines Dino Candy
items.description: Has a curious effect when consumed by a dinosaur.

items.name: Bunny Egg
items.description: Put it in a Cooking Pot to craft fun costumes or place on the ground as a festive decoration!

items.name: Stolen Headstone
items.description: A headstone stolen from a graveyard.

items.name: Pumpkin
items.description: Decorate your base with this pumpkin. Can be "carved" with all manner of paints.

items.name: Scarecrow
items.description: Decorate your base with this scarecrow.  Guaranteed to scare the crows away.

items.name: Dinosaur Bone
items.description: A very ancient looking bone, must be usefull for something!

items.name: Kami Implant
items.description: Equip this implant onto any creature from Additional Creatures: Kami Creations. Provides armor similar to a saddle!
